output_list.reason: The distributeFUD function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to set the balances of recipients to a very large value, leading to a locked contract.
The transfer function does not check for overflow, allowing users to set their balances to a very large value, leading to a locked contract.
The approve function does not check for overflow, allowing users to set the allowance to a very large value, leading to a locked contract.
The transferFrom function does not check for overflow, allowing users to transfer a large amount of tokens, leading to a locked contract.
The constructor has a typo, causing it to revert to a fallback function, making the contract unusable.
